definition: small figure/small amount/the part of a number to the right of the decimal point (or radix point)/fractional part of a number/number between 0 and 1/decimal fraction
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Multiple decimal separators result in truncation.
sentences.chinese: 多个小数分隔符会导致截断。

sentences.english: The final numerical values, as displayed, were rounded off to three decimal places.
sentences.chinese: 所表现出的最终数值舍入到小数三位。

sentences.english: If field width is smaller than the number of digit, it will display ONE decimal places.
sentences.chinese: 如果栏宽小过实数的数位，便会显示一个小数位。

sentences.english: Today we have learnt how to change between decimal fractions and compound numbers.
sentences.chinese: 今天我们学习了小数与复名数的相互转换。
小数点显然放错位置了。

sentences.english: Rounds a double-precision floating-point value to the nearest integer.
sentences.chinese: 将双精度浮点值舍入至指定的小数位数。

sentences.english: The integer and fraction parts both consist of a sequence of decimal (base ten) digits.
sentences.chinese: 整数和小数部分都由十进制数字序列组成。

sentences.english: The difference is that the number mask allows for decimal points.
sentences.chinese: 不同之处在于，这里的数字掩码允许小数点。

sentences.english: Take out percent sign, move decimal points two places to the left.
sentences.chinese: 去掉百分号，小数点向左移动两位。

sentences.english: The mass of silver decoration reserves a decimal fraction while writing.
sentences.chinese: 银饰品的质量，在书写时保留一位小数。
由这个小数位引出的差距却是巨大的。

sentences.english: Integer part and decimal part can be once conversed in this method.
sentences.chinese: 整数与小数部分可一次性进行转换。

sentences.english: The scale gives the total number of decimal places.
sentences.chinese: 等级指示所有小数位的个数。

sentences.english: Decimals and scientific notation are permissible for numeric values.
sentences.chinese: 对于数值，允许使用小数和科学记数法。

sentences.english: The fractional part of a logarithm.
Integers don't have fractions, and so the "remainder" is lopped off.
sentences.chinese: 整数没有小数部分，所以余数部分被砍掉了。

definition: Tarsus, Mediterranean city in Turkey, the birthplace of St Paul
composite number (i.e. not prime, has a factorization)
recurring section of a rational decimal
rational number (i.e. fraction of two integers, math.)
